mapper.select: SELECT q.qna_no, m.market_no, u.user_id, q.qna_title, q.qna_comment, q.qna_date, q.qna_sort FROM TB_QNA q, TB_USER u, TB_MARKET WHERE q.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY q.qna_no ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_REPORT( q.qna_no, m.market_no, u.user_id, q.qna_title, q.qna_comment, q.qna_date, q.qna_sort ) VALUES( qna_seq.nextval, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') )
